title: Three Little Gnomes and a Boy Named Orion: Adapted ~ early / beginner reader version for kids
description: Three little gnomes live, work, and play in Grammy's beautiful garden. They have a happy life until one day they realize, they have no names! They are so sad . . . and confused! Find out how these adorable gnomes solve this GREAT - BIG - PROBLEM . . . and make a new best friend. An easy / beginner reader and bedtime story for kids.
author: Rhonda Paglia
